alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:38AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG AFFECTING AREAS ALONG IRON RANGE AND NEAR LAKE SUPERIOR THIS MORNING... Areas of locally dense fog will affect areas near Lake Superior and along the Iron Range this morning, including the cities of Hibbing, Duluth, Superior, Silver Bay, and Two Harbors. Visibilities of one half to one quarter of a mile have already been observed and are expected to continue. Visibilities are expected to improve through the morning. If traveling tonight, reduce your speed and use low- beam headlights when encountering foggy areas. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed. Keep updated on the latest forecast for fog development trends.
